## luminanceAlpha variable

Returns transformation matrix which computes luminance of user color (optionally with custom coefficients), uses result as alpha channel and clears RGB channels (all set to zero).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
luminanceAlpha: ([r, g, b]?: number[]) => [number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number]
```
